content.question: Which of the meter signatures below represents a compound meter?

choices.label: The figure presents the first option, Option A of question 73. The option is: a meter of three eight time.
The figure presents the second option, Option B of question 73. The option is: a meter of four eight time.
The figure presents the third option, Option C of question 73. The option is: a meter of five eight time.
The figure presents the fourth option, Option D of question 73. The option is: a meter of six eight time.

content.answer: The figure presents the fourth option, Option D of question 73. The option is: a meter of six eight time.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
